title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah and Syrian Army Targets: A Comprehensive Report on the Latest Attacks”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked the terror infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory and a military equipment storehouse of the Syrian army in Syrian territory.

Yesterday (Friday), IDF fighter jets attacked a military infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization in Jabal Blat area. During the attack, a terrorist present at the site was killed. In addition, a military structure was attacked in the Bint Jbeil area. Furthermore, over the last day, the IDF attacked several areas in southern Lebanon using artillery fire.

During the night, in response to launches from Syrian territory into the southern Golan Heights that did not cross into Israeli territory, the IDF attacked with artillery fire the shooting area and IDF fighter jets attacked a military equipment storehouse of the Syrian army in the Mahja area.
